item.description:
We'll be meeting at 7pm at the Cambridge Common baseball diamond which is located a couple blocks north of Harvard Square. We generally play from 7 to 9:30 and then go out for food and drinks. Before attending our events, please review our About Us page.



We'd recommend you bring a light-colored shirt for visibility's sake and a change of clothes if it's a wet day. We supply all of the equipment necessary so there's really nothing else you need to bring besides your smiling face. :)

Our Organizers pay out of pocket for the frisbees, frisbee batteries, glowsticks, field cones and first aid kits. Consider bringing a couple bucks or visiting our Amazon Wishlist to support our equipment costs. Our group is free and will always be that way but your optional donations are certainly appreciated!



Parking for the Cambridge Common is tricky, so we'd advise you to take public transportation. However, if you do need to park, use this utility to find metered parking spaces (free after 6).





If you have any questions about our group, don't hesitate to contact either our Organizers or our Team Ambassadors! To learn more about their roles, click here. See you on the field!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll either be tossing frisbees or sitting alongside the baseball diamond.
item.why: We've created an awesome community of fun people who go out of their way to ensure that everyone feels welcomed and included. We also have fantastic games of Ultimate!
item.name: Illuminated Frisbee on Cambridge Common
